alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 6:35PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Las Animas County through 715 PM MDT... At 635 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles south of Thatcher, or 32 miles northeast of Trinidad, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Las Animas County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southeastern Colorado.
